correspondence.message: I am an MSc Informatics student and recently completed my second praktikum. Unfortunately, the grade I received is lower than I wanted, and I would like to inquire about options to replace it. Can I replace the grade with a new praktikum, regular courses, or guided research?"
Yes, you can replace the grade of your praktikum by taking a new praktikum, by taking regular courses, or by doing guided research.
